food.question: I am yellow and yummy. Monkeys like to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I grow on trees!
💛 My peel is a bright color.
😋 I am soft and easy to eat.

food.question: I am round and juicy. I am red, green, or yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
🍎 Doctors say I keep them away!
🥧 People make pie from me.

food.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow in the ground.
👀 I help you see better!
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I'm a vegetable
🌱 I'm good with butter!
👪 I'm often served as a side dish.

food.question: I am white and good with cookies. Cows give me to you. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am a drink.
🐄 Baby cows drink me from their mothers.
🥣 I am often poured on cereal.

food.question: I am orange, sweet, and juicy. I grow on trees in warm places. What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 My color is in my name.
☀️ I'm a citrus fruit.
🍹 People make juice from me.

food.question: I'm a yummy treat, sometimes with frosting and sprinkles. You eat me on your birthday! What am I?

hints.text: 🎂 I often have candles on top.
🍰 People sing a song to you when I am served.
🎉 I make celebrations more fun!

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have tiny black seeds.
🟤 My skin is rough.
🌿 I taste sweet and a little tart.

food.question: I'm long and thin, made from flour and water. You eat me with sauce. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I come in different shapes like spirals and tubes.
🇮🇹 I'm a popular Italian food.
🍅 Tomato sauce goes well with me!

food.question: I am made from potatoes, and you can get me at McDonald's. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I am best served hot
🧂 Salt is yummy on me.
🥔 I can be eaten with ketchup.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and you need an umbrella. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from the clouds
☔ I make puddles
🌧️ You don't want to forget your umbrella on days with me

weather.question: I am hot and bright. I come out during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I make shadows
😎 You might need sunglasses when I'm out
☀️ I help plants grow

weather.question: I move the trees and blow your hair. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong
🪁 You can fly a kite with me
🌬️ I can make the leaves fall down

weather.question: I am white and cold and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of ice
☃️ You can build a snowman with me
🧤 You need mittens when I am on the ground

weather.question: I am made of tiny water drops, you cannot see too far when I am around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I can make it hard to see while driving
👻 Sometimes people say I look like a ghost
🌁 I am like a cloud on the ground

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors
🍀 People say there's gold at the end of me
🌦️ You often see me after the rain stops and the sun comes out

weather.question: I am a big, white thing in the sky, sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like a fluffy animal
☁️ I float in the sky
💧 Sometimes rain falls from me

weather.question: I am cold and hard, and I fall from the sky like little balls of ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can hurt if I hit you
⛈️ I often come with thunderstorms
⚾ I am bigger than rain but smaller than snow

weather.question: I flash in the sky during a storm and can be very loud. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am very bright
🌩️ You often hear thunder after you see me
✨ I am a form of electricity

weather.question: I am a loud booming sound that follows a flash of light in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 You cover your ears when you hear me
⛈️ I follow lightning
💥 I am the sound of the air heating up very quickly
